Create a Question (Post Request)

http://localhost/web_ponty/index.php/api/question

Parameter

  • name = New Question
  • category_id = [id]
  • stack_id = [id]

Sample Response

{ 

"public" : 0,
"blocked" : 0,
"rating" : "0",
"rating_count" : 0,
"rating_sum" : 0,
"name" : "New Question",
"id" : "3",
"stack_id" : null,
"category_id" : null,
"created" : null

}

Update a Question (Post Request)

http://localhost/web_ponty/index.php/api/question/[id]

Parameter

  • name = Updated Question
  • category_id = [id]
  • stack_id = [id]

Sample Response

{ 

"id" : "1",
"public" : "1",
"name" : "Updated Question",
"blocked" : "0",
"stack_id" : "6",
"category_id" : null,
"rating" : "0",
"created" : "2013-10-29 16:04:35",
"rating_count" : "0",
"rating_sum" : "0"

}

Delete a Question (Delete Request)

http://localhost/web_ponty/index.php/api/question/[id]
